review: Friends and i started playing togther, friend breaks laptop, I break a mug, I break monitor several broken items later decide to stop playing due to high amounts of rage do not buy if you have issues with rage casue by the end of the day you are out $300 and a bunch of excuses. I only recomend the game due to some of the fun i had such as most deadliest weapon being a pistol as well as shanking 22 people in one game.
